titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1996 to deauthorize the remainder of the project at East Boothbay Harbor, Maine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 4/28/1998--Introduced. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1996 to deauthorize the remainder of the project for navigation at East Boothbay Harbor, Maine.
